name: PhotoSpherix-
overview: PhotoSpherix - A midwest 360 product photography firm specializes in taking your product and making it stand out in the crowd on the internet. With our custom designed photography rigs, we are capable of photographing your products and making them feel as if they are in the hands of your customers. They can look at every angle of the product. This helps to better inform your vistors and ultimately increase sales on your end.
